description: [SYNful Knock](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0519) can be sent instructions via special packets to change its functionality. Code for new functionality can be included in these messages.(Citation: Mandiant - Synful Knock)

external_references.description: Bill Hau, Tony Lee, Josh Homan. (2015, September 15). SYNful Knock - A Cisco router implant - Part I. Retrieved October 19, 2020.
